constructors.name: ShapeUpdate
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a ShapeUpdate record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: direction
methods.description: Returns the value of the direction record component.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the value of the state record component.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Returns the value of the pos record component.

methods.name: neighborPos
methods.description: Returns the value of the neighborPos record component.

methods.name: updateFlags
methods.description: Returns the value of the updateFlags record component.

methods.name: updateLimit
methods.description: Returns the value of the updateLimit record component.
